name: Gearend
description: Gearend is a small 2D non-linear action-platforming exploration game. You control a small robot named Epsilon-98, or Eps, as he explores a hostile robotics research facility. Fight, restore, and explore as you search for the humans who awakened you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2-GHZ Single-Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL ES 2-compatible Graphics Card (e.g. NVIDIA GTX 660) Storage: 179 MB available space Sound Card: The kind that plays sounds
